story: Ashinaka High School is a school with a rather unique setting - the campus is built on an entire island. Shiro, also known as Isana Yashiro, is having lunch with a little kitten on one of the school rooftops. After lunch, Shiro goes on an errand for his classmate Kukuri (Yukizome Kukuri) to buy some things for the upcoming school festival, but once he crosses the bridge into town he finds himself being chased by some rather intimidating men!

A mysterious man who uses traditional martial arts and calls himself Yatogami Kuroh has saved Shiro from trouble. Even though he just saved him, it also seems he wants to kill Shiro - and Shiro has no idea why. Fortunately, Shiro manages to get away through some quick thinking, but Kuroh follows him all the way back to his dormitory on Campus Island. It also seems the cute kitten that has been following Shiro around has changed into a beautiful girl!
Shiro and Kuroh have made a truce for the time being,
